title: Confront the Elder Brain
content: High Hall. Remember you can now summon as many allies as you want during the fight. But they can only be summoned in battle, and they will not be summoned again once they die. On your way to the Elder Brain, A Nautiloid will aim and bombard the area when you climb the stairs. Stay away from the marked area ASAP to avoid being killed. If you find the fight in High Hall courtyard too diffcult, you can use the Upper City Sewer, which provides you a short cut to High Hall, guarded by Death Knight S
